entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:46 a.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.3Â°C

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries and freezing rain beginning near noon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:09 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain and ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 10:09 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:09 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
